channel.title: exploration on adp
channel.description: Recent content in exploration on adp

item.title: mapping music
item.description: I was going a bit mad during lockdown, and this was one of the small projects that kept me going. It also helped get me a job! mapping music During lockdown, like you, I’ve listened to a lot of music. I’ve listened to so much music that I’ve found myself thinking about how to think about the ways I listen to music. oh man you’re gonna love this next track At parties, when we used to have parties, I remember finding myself listening to a song and immediately thinking about what song I wanted to listen to next.

item.title: internet explorer
item.description: This blog post is an exploration into the wiring of the internet. When we move information across the internet, what does its path look like? to boldly go where many have gone before addressing the internet When I was fifteen I had (or I thought I had) this real funny desktop background, Now, years later, I have a better background and a computer science degree. But it turns out that the internet is not so different from the postal system.
